import React from 'react' import "./Rating.css" import StarIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Star'; import StarHalfIcon from '@material-ui/icons/StarHalf'; import StarBorderIcon from '@material-ui/icons/StarBorder'; const Rating = ({value, text}) => { return (

{value >= 1 ? : value >= 0.5 ? : }

{value >= 2 ? : value >= 1.5 ? : }

{value >= 3 ? : value >= 2.5 ? : }

{value >= 4 ? : value >= 3.5 ? : }

{value >= 5 ? : value >= 4.5 ? : }

 {text && text}
) } export default Rating
